codex.notes: Codex governance expansion; Version Parliament established as Tier-2 Standard; repository and UI rules aligned.

officeBoard.notes: JSON-driven Active Permits; auto scrolling; version footer; SSE-ready structure.

activePermits.notes: Converted from spreadsheet to JSON; governed by Version Parliament; consumed by OfficeBoard.

sse.notes: Improved holiday + interval sync; supports OfficeBoard 8.x timing logic; adheres to SSE Tier rules.

skyebot.notes: Updated intent parser; timezone logic; stability improvements; Codex-aligned system context.
